svg.text: Dynamic Rights Spectrum for Environmental Entities
Recognition and Protection Across Environmental Stewardship
‚Ä¢ Ecological Significance: Biodiversity, ecosystem services, environmental health impact
‚Ä¢ Scientific Assessment: Evidence-based evaluation of complexity, sentience, and autonomy
‚Ä¢ Cultural Recognition: Indigenous knowledge, spiritual significance, community values
‚Ä¢ Legal Framework: Guardianship structures, representation mechanisms, enforcement systems
